You have questions, we have answers.




What ingredients are in Organic Beard Supply's Beard Oils?

We take great care in what we put on our bodies and know you do, too. So, Organic Beard Supply's Beard Oils are made with a unique blend of three USDA Organic base oils including Grape Seed, Jajoba, and Argan Oil. We then add just the right amount of USDA Organic essential oils to create different scents, each with their own distinct characteristics and benefits. Find the scent that fits you or get one of each by browsing our Beard Oil scent options.

What is the correct way to apply Beard Oil?

Apply Beard Oil by putting a few drops of oil in the palm of your hand and rubbing them together. Run your hands through your beard working the oil in, then comb through your beard to evenly distribute the oil throughout your hair and to the skin underneath.

How  long does one order of Beard Oil last?

According to the size of your beard, and the amount of oil your beard needs to stay healthy (see "How much Beard Oil should be used at one time"), a one-month order of Beard Oil should last you just that, approximately one month. You can even get a [yearly subscription]() which will deliver a bottle of Beard Oil to your door at the beginning of every month for a year!

What does "Grass Roots" mean?

Grass Roots is a term we use to describe our "down-to-earth" approach to providing a quality product. We make and sell our Beard Oils because we're passionate about two things: beards and an organic lifestyle. Both things we at Organic Beard Supply live by on a daily basis.

What benefits do Organic Beard Supply's Beard Oil Provide?

Beard oil is designed to replace what's stripped away from your beard on a daily basis and give it much needed vitamins and minerals to promote healthy hair growth and healthy skin under the beard. It can remedy things like bumps and stop the dreaded beard itch. 

Are Organic Beard Supply's Bread Oils really organic?

Yes! We go to great lengths to make sure that all of our base and essential oils are 100% USDA Organic.

How much Beard Oil should be used at one time?

A little bit of Beard Oil goes a long way. We typically recommend (per day) 1-2 drops for a short beard, 3-4 drops for a medium beard, and 4-5 drops for a large beard. Though, you know your beard best so experiment and figure out how many drops suit your beard's needs.

What does "Hand-Crafted" mean?

Hand-crafted means every single bottle of Organic Beard Supply's Beard Oil is measured, blended, and bottled by hand. Each bottle is handled with care by fellow bearded men that make and share a product they use daily on their own beards.

What does "Small Batch" mean?

Each batch of Organic Beard Supply's Beard Oil is hand-crafted in small batch quantities assuring you receive a product that is handled with care from start to finish.
